body_html:
Hi,

After upgrading pip (9.0.1), I get now this error by installing tensorflow (and do not find any information to fix it) - I use ubuntu 13.04.

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/bin/pip", line 9, in
load_entry_point('pip==9.0.1', 'console_scripts', 'pip')()
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/init.py", line 233, in main
return command.main(cmd_args)
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 251, in main
timeout=min(5, options.timeout)) as session:
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 72, in _build_session
insecure_hosts=options.trusted_hosts,
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/download.py", line 329, in init
self.headers["User-Agent"] = user_agent()
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/download.py", line 93, in user_agent
from pip._vendor import distro
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/_vendor/distro.py", line 1050, in
_distro = LinuxDistribution()
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/_vendor/distro.py", line 594, in init
if include_lsb else {}
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/_vendor/distro.py", line 933, in _get_lsb_release_info
raise subprocess.CalledProcessError(code, cmd, stdout)
subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command 'lsb_release -a' returned non-zero exit status 134
body_text:
Hi,
After upgrading pip (9.0.1), I get now this error by installing tensorflow (and do not find any information to fix it) - I use ubuntu 13.04.
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/bin/pip", line 9, in

body:
Hi,

After upgrading pip (9.0.1), I get now this error by installing tensorflow (and do not find any information to fix it) - I use ubuntu 13.04.


Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/bin/pip", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('pip==9.0.1', 'console_scripts', 'pip')()
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/__init__.py", line 233, in main
    return command.main(cmd_args)
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 251, in main
    timeout=min(5, options.timeout)) as session:
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/basecommand.py", line 72, in _build_session
    insecure_hosts=options.trusted_hosts,
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/download.py", line 329, in __init__
    self.headers["User-Agent"] = user_agent()
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/download.py", line 93, in user_agent
    from pip._vendor import distro
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/_vendor/distro.py", line 1050, in <module>
    _distro = LinuxDistribution()
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/_vendor/distro.py", line 594, in __init__
    if include_lsb else {}
  File "/home/ypsa6500/tensorflow/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip/_vendor/distro.py", line 933, in _get_lsb_release_info
    raise subprocess.CalledProcessError(code, cmd, stdout)
subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command 'lsb_release -a' returned non-zero exit status 134
